Key Match Events: Paolo Banchero made a clutch 3-pointer with 22 seconds left to bring the Magic within one point of the Bucks.
The game resulted in a close loss for the Magic despite Banchero's strong performance.
The Bucks maintained control throughout the game, securing a victory despite the Magic's efforts.
Post-Match Reflections: Paolo Banchero's return highlighted the Magic's potential despite their injury struggles.
The loss emphasized the challenges the Magic face with key players injured.
